summary: Rati had a massive churn, deploying a tricky Gemini-powered AI activity timeline to his portfolio and giving his GeoTiff pipeline a much-needed Hydra configuration refactor.
Rati executed a massive 4,200+ line blitz on his `portfolio`, adding SEO, dynamic routing for Blog/Uses pages, and delightful Konami code easter eggs.
Rati performed a massive documentation overhaul for his GeoTiff pipeline, deleting mountains of redundant READMEs and finally stabilizing crucial Sentinel-1 satellite functionality.
Rati didn't just update his README; he executed a 445-line documentation migration in `rvardiashvili/rvardiashvili`, clearly proving he takes project intros seriously.
